title: RepoWeaver Configuration
description: Configuration schema for RepoWeaver template repository management

name.description: Name of the project or repository

templates.description: List of template repositories to apply

oneOf.description: Template repository URL (uses default branch and root directory)

name.description: Name for the template (used for identification)

branch.description: Branch to use from the template repository

subDirectory.description: Subdirectory within the template repository to use

oneOf.description: Default merge strategy for all files

mergeStrategies.description: File pattern-based merge strategies with priority ordering

excludePatterns.description: Glob patterns for files to exclude from processing

includePatterns.description: Glob patterns for files to include (overrides excludePatterns)

autoUpdate.description: Automatically update repository when templates change

createRepository.description: Create a new repository on GitHub

initGit.description: Initialize git repository in the target directory

addRemote.description: Git remote URL to add as origin (supports variable substitution)

hooks.description: Shell commands to run at various stages

preBootstrap.description: Commands to run before starting the bootstrap process

postBootstrap.description: Commands to run after completing the bootstrap process

preTemplate.description: Commands to run before processing each template

postTemplate.description: Commands to run after processing each template

variables.description: Variables for substitution in configuration values and hooks

plugins.description: List of plugin names to load for additional merge strategies

oneOf.description: Template name or URL from templates array

primarySourceRule.description: Custom primary source rule with file patterns and template designation

patterns.description: Glob patterns to match files against

template.description: Template to use as primary source for these patterns

priority.description: Priority for this rule (higher numbers take precedence)

type.description: Type of merge strategy to use

implementation.description: For custom: path to implementation file, for plugin: plugin name

options.description: Options passed to the merge strategy

filePatternMergeStrategy.description: File pattern-based merge strategy rule with optional primary source designation

patterns.description: Glob patterns to match files against

category.description: Category name for a built-in file pattern group (e.g. 'typescript', 'ci-workflows', etc.)

priority.description: Priority for this rule (higher numbers take precedence)

primarySource.description: Template to use as the authoritative source for files matched by this rule
